name: Shopify App Store
options: Max number of apps to scrape
Specific apps to scrape by URL
special_instructions: appsUrls is an array of URLs of the apps you want to crawl, leave empty to crawl all apps
maxItems is the maximum number of apps you want to scrape. Set to 0 to scrape all.
The output fields that will be returned are: title, author, description, url, appHandle, appUrl, pageTitle, grades, gradeInt
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
